awardsHtml:
2 wins & 4 nominations

BAFTA Awards

2011 Nominee BAFTA TV Award
Best Director Factual
Nicolas Brown (For episode 'Arctic')
2011 Winner BAFTA TV Award
Best Editing Factual
Jason Savage (For episode 'Arctic')
2011 Nominee BAFTA TV Award
Best Sound Factual
Willow Murton - Kate Hopkins - Mark Ferda - Rachael Kinley (For episode 'Jungles')
2011 Nominee BAFTA TV Award
Best Sound Factual
Martyn Harries - Kate Hopkins (For episode 'Oceans')
2011 Nominee BAFTA TV Award
Best Specialist Factual
Brian Leith - Dale Templar - Nitin Sawhney - Tom Hugh-Jones

News & Documentary Emmy Awards
